name: Interstellar Bartender
description:
See how much money you can earn before your shift ends! Assemble the right combination of ingredients to fill orders, but be careful not to make drinks nobody wants or it will cost you!

Orders will appear on the left and you must fill the orders by adding ingredients from the queue at the bottom, if you don't need an ingredient then you can throw it away at no cost. All drinks require three ingredients and will net you the listed price but if you make a drink that was not ordered you will lose $5.
